item.title: [Facebook] Page Admin Disclosure via an Upgraded Page Post
item.description: Been in the bug bounty and/or ethical hacking scene for more than 4 years now and this is my first write-up (I hope you bear with me) since most of the programs I hunt into are not allowing disclosures. I mostly hunt vulnerabilities on Alibaba and other independent/private bug bounty programs. Description Soooo I was posting for a special event that happened in one of my organization’s pages. I upgraded that post through a prompt message, “It looks like something special happened.
